data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to collect annual information about e.g. blood glucose levels, serum lipid values, kidney functions (e.g. GFR, urine quality [e.g. creatinine and sodium content, pH, volume]). - Year 8 values

variable.name: RANDSAS
variable.description: CBL8: Randomization date

variable.name: BCLDT
variable.description: CBL8: GFR collection date

variable.name: BCSGLUCB
variable.description: CBL8: GFR serum glucose - pre-injection value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCSGLUC0
variable.description: CBL8: GFR serum glucose - t0 value (mg/dl; t0= at least 60 minutes following 125-I Iothalamate injection)

variable.name: BCSGLUC1
variable.description: CBL8: GFR serum glucose - t1 value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCSGLUC2
variable.description: CBL8: GFR serum glucose - t2 value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCSGLUC3
variable.description: CBL8: GFR serum glucose - t3 value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCSGLUC4
variable.description: CBL8: GFR serum glucose - t4 value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCSGLUC5
variable.description: CBL8: GFR serum glucose - t5 value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCURINEB
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count urine - background

variable.name: BCURINE1
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count urine - t1

variable.name: BCURINE2
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count urine - t2

variable.name: BCURINE3
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count urine - t3

variable.name: BCURINE4
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count urine - t4

variable.name: BCURINE5
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count urine - t5

variable.name: BCSERUMB
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count serum - pre-injection

variable.name: BCSERUM0
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count serum - t0

variable.name: BCSERUM1
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count serum - t1

variable.name: BCSERUM2
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count serum - t2

variable.name: BCSERUM3
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count serum - t3

variable.name: BCSERUM4
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count serum - t4

variable.name: BCSERUM5
variable.description: CBL8: GFR gamma count serum - t5

variable.name: F023CMBG
variable.description: CBL8: Form date for GFR tests

variable.name: REPEAT_G
variable.description: CBL8: Repeat evaluation for GFR tests

variable.name: BCLDTF
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: collection date

variable.name: BCURCR
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: creatinine/urine: value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCSPCR
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: creatinine/specimen value (mg/spec)

variable.name: BCCOCR
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: creatinine coefficient (mg/kg/spec)

variable.name: BCSODIUM
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: sodium (meq/l)

variable.name: BCUREAN
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: urea nitrogen (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCPH
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: pH

variable.name: BCDURAT
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: duration

variable.name: BCWT
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: weight

variable.name: BCVOL
variable.description: CBL8: 24-hr urine: volume

variable.name: F0233F
variable.description: CBL8: Form date for 24-hr urine tests

variable.name: REPEAT_F
variable.description: CBL8: Repeat evaluation for 24-hr urine tests

variable.name: BCLDT12
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 12: collection date

variable.name: BCVAL12
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 12: albumin (serum) value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCVAL13
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 13: creatinine (serum) value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCVAL14
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 14: albumin (urine) value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCVAL15
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 15: AER value (mcg/mn)

variable.name: BCVAL16
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 16: creatinine (urine) value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCVAL17
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 17: patient's height in cm

variable.name: BCVAL18
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 18: patient's weight in kg

variable.name: BCVAL19
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 19: raw clearance value (ml/mn)

variable.name: BCVAL20A
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 20a: standard clearance (ml/mn/1.73m²)

variable.name: BCVAL20B
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 20b: duration (hours)

variable.name: BCVAL20C
variable.description: CBL8: Renal test - 20c: volume (ml)

variable.name: F023CMBB
variable.description: CBL8: Form date for renal function tests

variable.name: REPEAT_B
variable.description: CBL8: Repeat evaluation for renal tests

variable.name: BCLDT21
variable.description: CBL8: Lipid test - 21: collection date

variable.name: BCVAL21
variable.description: CBL8: Lipid test - 21: cholesterol (serum) value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCVAL22
variable.description: CBL8: Lipid test - 22: triglyceride (serum) value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCVAL23
variable.description: CBL8: Lipid test - 23: HDL cholesterol (serum) value (mg/dl)

variable.name: BCNLD24
variable.description: CBL8: Lipid test - 24: collection date

variable.name: BCVAL24
variable.description: CBL8: Lipid test - 24: LDL cholesterol (serum) value (mg/dl)

variable.name: F023CMBC
variable.description: CBL8: Form date for lipid tests

variable.name: REPEAT_C
variable.description: CBL8: Repeat evaluation for lipid tests

variable.name: GFR1
variable.description: CBL8: Glomerular filtration rate - 1st period

variable.name: GFR2
variable.description: CBL8: Glomerular filtration rate - 2nd period

variable.name: GFR3
variable.description: CBL8: Glomerular filtration rate - 3rd period

variable.name: GFR4
variable.description: CBL8: Glomerular filtration rate - 4th period

variable.name: BSA
variable.description: CBL8: Body surface area (current)

variable.name: GFRAVG
variable.description: CBL8: Mean GFR unadjusted (ml/min)

variable.name: GFRCV
variable.description: CBL8: GFR coefficient of variation (percent)

variable.name: GFR_ADJ
variable.description: CBL8: Average GFR adjusted for current body surface area

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: CBL8: Patient ID number
